question: In which of the following sessions of the Indian National Congress was the "Poorna Swaraj" resolution adopted?
explanation: The Purna Swaraj declaration, or Declaration of the Independence of India, was promulgated by the Indian National Congress on 19 December 1929, at Lahore session, resolving the Congress and Indian nationalists to fight for Purna Swaraj, or complete self-rule independent of the British Empire.
